title: How long does it normally take to make a website?
content: It depends what package you choose, but on average it takes around 2 weeks.

title: Why should you get a website?
content: Your website acts as a platform to educate people about your business, products and services whenever they need it, helping to move them along their journey until they choose to buy from you.

title: What does maintenance include?
content: Maintenance includes changes to the website as well as revisions and adding content.

title: What is your experience as a web developer?
content: As a freelance web developer, I have 5+ years of experience in the field. During this time, I've worked on a diverse range of projects for clients from various industries. I have expertise in front-end and back-end development, responsive design, and content management systems like WordPress. My portfolio showcases some of my past work, which includes portfolio sites.
